All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
DatabaseConnection
This class is a singleton that handles the connection to the database.
DrinkClass
This class is a drink class for GUI
DrinkService
This class deals with drink interactions with the database (fetching products, adding drinks to order, etc)
ExcessReport
This class deals with excess report
Inventory
This class represents the inventory of the store.
Inventory.InventoryItem
This class represents an inventory item, which has a name, quantity in stock, and cost.
Landing
This class deals with landing page of the app
MainApp
This class deals with the main app
ManagerService
This class deals with manager interactions with the database
MenuService
This class deals with the menu tab interaction with the database (adding drinks, removing drinks, etc)
MenuUpdate
This class represents the main application for updating the drink menu.
OrderHistory
This class represents the order history of a customer, including the order ID, order items, order date, order time, and total price.
OrderHistoryApp
This class for order history
OrderItem
This class stores order items with their order id, product id, product name, sweetness, and ice level
OrderService
This method is for order db stuff
RestockReport
This class generates a restock report for items in the inventory that need restocking.
UserService
This method is for user db stuff
UserSession
This method is for user session constructor
